.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceResponse`1<.ctor (class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Resource) TResource> extends Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.ResourceResponseBase implements class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.IResourceResponse`1<!TResource>, class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.IResourceResponseBase

Docs.summary: Represents the template class used by methods returning single objects in the Azure DocumentDB database service.
Docs.remarks: All responses from creates, reads, updates and deletes of Azure DocumentDB resources return the response wrapped in a ResourceResponse object. This contains the metadata from the response headers from the Azure DocumentDB call including the request units (RequestCharge), activity ID and quotas/usage of resources.
